${ModID}:HeavyLifting.NAME: Heavy Lifting
DESCRIPTIONS: Strength for every #bAttack played this turn.

${ModID}:Overstrain.NAME: Overstrain
DESCRIPTIONS: The next #bAttack you play deals half damage.

${ModID}:FortifyPower.NAME: Fortify
DESCRIPTIONS: For the next #b%1$s turns, gain #b%2$s Block.

${ModID}:FrenzyPower.NAME: Frenzy
DESCRIPTIONS: Next turn, add #b%1$s #yFrenzy to your hand.

${ModID}:ReachBeyondPower.NAME: Reach Beyond
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever a card is #yExhausted, gain #b%1$s [E] next turn.

${ModID}:ForceOfNaturePower.NAME: Force of Nature
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, deal damage to a random enemy equal to half of your Block.

${ModID}:ReplicatePower.NAME: Replicate
DESCRIPTIONS: This turn, the next Skill you play is played next turn
At the start of next turn, play #b%1$s.
